zh-cn: 理查德·米尔豪斯·尼克松

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾担任第37任美国总统和第36任美国副总统。
description.en: American politician who served as the 37th president of the United States and the 36th vice president.

zh-cn: 德怀特·大卫·艾森豪威尔

description.zh-cn: 美国第34任总统，理查德·尼克松担任副总统时的总统。
description.en: 34th President of the United States, under whom Richard Nixon served as Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 理查德·尼克松任内的第一位美国副总统，后因腐败丑闻辞职。
description.en: The first Vice President under Richard Nixon, who resigned due to a corruption scandal.

description.zh-cn: 理查德·尼克松任内的第二位美国副总统，在尼克松辞职后继任总统并赦免了他。
description.en: The second Vice President under Richard Nixon, who succeeded him as president and pardoned him.

description.zh-cn: 理查德·尼克松的妻子，美国第一夫人。
description.en: Wife of Richard Nixon and First Lady of the United States.

nodes.id: 特里西娅·尼克松·考克斯

zh-cn: 特里西娅·尼克松·考克斯

description.zh-cn: 理查德·尼克松的长女。
description.en: Richard Nixon's elder daughter.

nodes.id: 朱莉·尼克松·艾森豪威尔

zh-cn: 朱莉·尼克松·艾森豪威尔

description.zh-cn: 理查德·尼克松的幺女。
description.en: Richard Nixon's younger daughter.

description.zh-cn: 美国第35任总统，在1960年总统选举中击败理查德·尼克松。
description.en: 35th President of the United States, who defeated Richard Nixon in the 1960 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 美国副总统，在1968年总统选举中被理查德·尼克松击败。
description.en: Vice President of the United States, defeated by Richard Nixon in the 1968 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦参议员，在1972年总统选举中被理查德·尼克松以压倒性优势击败。
description.en: U.S. Senator, who was defeated by Richard Nixon in a landslide in the 1972 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一代主要领导人，在尼克松1972年访华时与其会面。
description.en: The paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, who met with Nixon during his 1972 visit.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院总理，在尼克松1972年访华时接待并与其会谈。
description.en: Premier of the People's Republic of China, who hosted and held talks with Nixon during his 1972 visit.

nodes.id: 列昂尼德·伊里奇·勃列日涅夫

zh-cn: 列昂尼德·伊里奇·勃列日涅夫

description.zh-cn: 苏联共产党中央委员会总书记，与尼克松总统会晤并推动了缓和政策。
description.en: General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, who met with President Nixon and promoted the policy of détente.

description.zh-cn: 尼克松政府的国家安全顾问和国务卿，在其外交政策中扮演核心角色。
description.en: National Security Advisor and Secretary of State under Nixon, playing a central role in his foreign policy.

description.zh-cn: 前美国国务院官员，被尼克松在国会期间指控为苏联间谍。
description.en: Former U.S. State Department official accused by Nixon of being a Soviet spy during his time in Congress.

description.zh-cn: 理查德·尼克松的本科母校。
description.en: Richard Nixon's undergraduate alma mater.

description.zh-cn: 理查德·尼克松获得法律博士学位的法学院。
description.en: The law school from which Richard Nixon earned his law degree.

description.zh-cn: 理查德·尼克松所属的美国主要政党。
description.en: The major American political party to which Richard Nixon belonged.

description.zh-cn: 理查德·尼克松在第二次世界大战期间服役的军事部门。
description.en: The military branch in which Richard Nixon served during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国的国家元首和政府首脑，理查德·尼克松曾担任此职。
description.en: The head of state and head of government of the United States of America, an office held by Richard Nixon.

en: Vice President of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府行政分支中位阶第二高的官员，理查德·尼克松曾担任此职。
description.en: The second-highest officer in the executive branch of the U.S. federal government, an office held by Richard Nixon.

description.zh-cn: 由理查德·尼克松总统于1970年提议成立的美国联邦政府独立机构。
description.en: An independent agency of the U.S. federal government proposed by President Richard Nixon in 1970.

description.zh-cn: 尼克松在1972年历史性访问的国家，开启了中美关系正常化的进程。
description.en: The country Nixon historically visited in 1972, beginning the process of normalizing relations.

description.zh-cn: 冷战时期与美国对峙的超级大国，尼克松总统与其推行缓和政策。
description.en: The superpower adversary of the U.S. during the Cold War, with whom President Nixon pursued a policy of détente.

description.zh-cn: 导致理查德·尼克松总统辞职的重大政治丑闻。
description.en: A major political scandal that led to the resignation of President Richard Nixon.

description.zh-cn: 尼克松总统任期内的主要外交和军事挑战，他最终通过“越南化”政策撤出美军。
description.en: A primary foreign and military challenge of Nixon's presidency, from which he eventually withdrew U.S. troops through the policy of "Vietnamization".

en: 1972 visit by Richard Nixon to China

description.zh-cn: 理查德·尼克松总统对中华人民共和国的历史性访问，是中美关系正常化的关键一步。
description.en: President Richard Nixon's historic visit to the People's Republic of China, a key step in normalizing relations.

description.zh-cn: 尼克松政府推行的旨在缓和与苏联等共产主义国家紧张关系的外交政策。
description.en: A foreign policy pursued by the Nixon administration aimed at easing strained relations with the Soviet Union and other communist nations.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国加利福尼亚州的城市，是理查德·尼克松的出生地。
description.en: A city in California, USA, the birthplace of Richard Nixon.

description.zh-cn: 理查德·尼克松逝世的城市。
description.en: The city where Richard Nixon passed away.

position.en: Vice President of the United States
Vice President of the United States
Vice President of the United States

relationships.source: 特里西娅·尼克松·考克斯
朱莉·尼克松·艾森豪威尔

description.zh-cn: 在1960年美国总统选举中以微弱劣势不敌肯尼迪。
description.en: Narrowly lost the 1960 presidential election to Kennedy.

description.zh-cn: 在1968年美国总统选举中击败汉弗莱。
description.en: Defeated Humphrey in the 1968 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 在1972年美国总统选举中以压倒性优势击败麦戈文。
description.en: Defeated McGovern in a landslide in the 1972 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 作为美国总统对中华人民共和国进行历史性访问。
description.en: As President of the United States, made a historic visit to the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 在1972年访华期间与毛泽东会面。
description.en: Met with Mao Zedong during his 1972 visit to China.

description.zh-cn: 在1972年访华期间与周恩来会谈。
description.en: Held talks with Zhou Enlai during his 1972 visit to China.

description.zh-cn: 与苏联等共产主义国家实施缓和政策，签订了SALT I和反弹道导弹条约。
description.en: Implemented the policy of détente with communist nations like the Soviet Union, signing the SALT I and Anti-Ballistic Missile treaties.

relationships.target: 列昂尼德·伊里奇·勃列日涅夫

description.zh-cn: 访问莫斯科，与苏联领导人勃列日涅夫等人会面，展开激烈谈判。
description.en: Visited Moscow and met with Soviet leader Brezhnev and others for intense negotiations.

description.zh-cn: 水门事件的不断发酵导致尼克松失去政治支持，最终迫使他辞去总统职务。
description.en: The unfolding Watergate scandal caused Nixon to lose political support, ultimately forcing him to resign from the presidency.

description.zh-cn: 在尼克松辞职后，福特总统宣布给予其全面、自由且绝对的赦免。
description.en: After Nixon's resignation, President Ford granted him a full, free, and absolute pardon.

description.zh-cn: 作为众议院非美活动委员会成员，以调查阿尔杰·希斯间谍案而引起全国性关注，并坚信希斯是苏联间谍。
description.en: As a member of the House Un-American Activities Committee, he gained national attention for investigating the Alger Hiss spy case, believing Hiss was a Soviet spy.

position.en: National Security Advisor, Secretary of State

description.zh-cn: 在尼克松政府中担任关键外交职务。
description.en: Held key foreign policy positions in the Nixon administration.

description.zh-cn: 越战是尼克松总统任期内的主要挑战，他推行“越南化”政策以逐步撤军，但战争和国内反战运动给其政府带来巨大压力。
description.en: The Vietnam War was a major challenge of Nixon's presidency; he pursued "Vietnamization" to withdraw troops, but the war and domestic anti-war movements placed immense pressure on his administration.

description.zh-cn: 宣布组建环境保护局。
description.en: Announced the formation of the Environmental Protection Agency.
